name: Solar Premium Panels
description: This is a global initiative not just limited to Ireland. A maximum of $100000 could be offered to legitimate request. Providers are specific about the needs. The request should only for solar power but no other alternatives

name: Rotors by the Beach
description: This is meant for wind power enthusiast who are keen to get mills installed near coastal areas.

name: Super dynamos1
description: A new invention by a bunch of graduate students. The insturment could be fitted into any automobile and could generated 10% more power than a conventional dynamo.
